definition: to come unscathed through a hundred battles (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3]); to win every fight
grave danger/in jeopardy/in a critical condition
to be used up/to be exhausted
To learn without thinking is confusing, to think without learning is dangerous (Confucius)
pinyin: xue2 er2 bu4 si1 ze2 wang3 , si1 er2 bu4 xue2 ze2 dai4
containing_words.word: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆

definition: know yourself and know your enemy, and you will never be defeated (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3])
pinyin: zhi1 ji3 zhi1 bi3 , bai3 zhan4 bu4 dai4

definition: knowing the enemy and yourself will get you unscathed through a hundred battles (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War")
pinyin: zhi1 bi3 zhi1 ji3 , bai3 zhan4 bu4 dai4

sentences.english: Two women seldom grow intimate but at the expense of a third person.
sentences.chinese: 两个女人，若非以第三个人为牺牲，则殆无。

sentences.english: Arithmetic progressions, any one in which consists of 3 primes and 1 almost prime, are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了由3个素数和1个殆素数构成的等差数列。

sentences.english: An almost lower bound is defined similarly as an almost upper bound.
sentences.chinese: 殆下界的定义与殆上界是类似的。

definition: classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
to deceive/there is none/old variant of 網|网[wang3]
then/at once/always/(archaic) luggage rack on a chariot
